title: Great but half screen is disappearing in iPad
text:
I like the telegram app a lot. It is my favorite chat app. However, there is some big issue that keeps me from even typing in chat boxes. I am using iPad air 2. 

Here is the big problem: when I try to send message or write in a group, the chat history space(on the right) and the people/group list(on the left) is raised to give space for the keyboard. But when I am done writing and lower/hide the keyboard. Everything raised stays on the raised position (doesn‚Äôt return to original position). This leaves the place the keyboard previously taken to be empty. That means half of the bottom screen will always remains empty with only background color. The solution is only restarting telegram app and not typing any thing. This issue need to be fixed. I have waited for more than 10 updates. It is not solved yet. Please consider it seriously and I can help you with providing more info. I tried to send it to volunteer support in telegram, but I haven‚Äôt received any response. 

I look forward to your response and fixes about this bug.
